name: AlignTech Solutions LLC
tag_list: consulting, alignment, engagement, information-technology, banking, healthcare, education
overview:
AlignTech Solutions is an information technology consulting, alignment and engagement services firm.

They work with small and midsize companies to help them get the most out of their information technology assets and resources that drive their operations.

Based in Neenah, WI, US, a diversified, vibrant commercial center in Wisconsin’s New North region.

Principal Consultant, Jeff Hayes, has over 20 years experience as a management consultant and software engineer for Fortune 500 companies.

Established in 2008 with a mission to: “…Create value for our clients through the discovery, understanding and management of information while fostering diversity and respect for all persons.”

Offer services in consulting, alignment and engagement. Specialize in the banking, healthcare and education industries.
